question: Which of the following institute celebrates its foundation day on April 2nd?
explanation: SIDBI celebrated its foundation day as the day of Sampark (connect), Samwad (interaction), Suraksha (security) and Sampreshan (disseminate) on 2nd April. On this occasion, SIDBI launched a series of initiatives. SIDBI launched 'Samridhhi-the virtual assistant' on banks revamped universal loan portal 'www.udyamimitra.in'. It will answer standard queries of aspirants 24*7.
